entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
